intro: Chorizanthe glabrescens, commonly known as the smooth choris, is a flowering plant native to the southwestern United States and northern Mexico. It belongs to the Amaranthaceae family and is characterized by its upright, branched stems and small, clustered flowers. The plant produces minute, dry fruits known as胞果, which contain single seeds. It typically grows in sandy or gravelly soils in arid and semi-arid environments. Chorizanthe glabrescens is adapted to thrive in harsh conditions with minimal water availability.
